column2: "Wait for me, Antoinette! That's far too fast a pace for a walk!"
"Haa...haa...!"
"Ah, my friend...! I am glad...you're doing well...!"
"My children are doing wonderfully. I can hardly keep up with them... Haa...haa...!"
"Wa-Wa-Wa-Watch it! What the heck is up with this thing?!"
"A shout from the direction Antoinette was headed! Could she have caused an incident...?"
"Alright, alright! I get it, you like me! You don't have to get all up in my business!"
"Ahh, <%me>. She just suddenly got jumped by this thing."
"Come on, Yu! You too, <%me>! Don't just stand there, do something!"
"As you can see, it doesn't seem to wanna leave Aurora alone."
"This is one of those Summoner Pets. Is it yours?"
"Antoinette...! You've set aside your misanthropy and let someone into your heart at last...!"
"The bonds of Destiny know no bounds...! What a marvelously beauteous sight! Don't you agree, my friend?"
"Are you okay with that?"
"Will she be alright?"
"Of course I feel a touch neglected... But I will endure! For Antoinette's sake!"
"You can tell by the sight of their powerful love. Those two will be quite alright. Painful though it may be, I am overjoyed!"
"Don't just decide things for yourself!"
"This is your Pet, isn't it? Make it behave already! And why does it keep following me?!"
"Maybe you smell tasty?"
"Because you look alike?"
"But I don't have any snacks on me! ...Wait, does it think I'm food?!"
"What are you, blind?! We're barely even the same color!"
"Maybe it feels a sense of kinship because you can both vanish and reappear at will?"
"Not to mention, you both like throwing your masters for a loop."
"Ohhhh, that's true! I toootally understand what's it like to be thrown around by a selfish master!"
"Ahhh! Seriously! Stop climbing all over me! Your fur! It's getting everywhere!"
"Uhuuu, Antoinette...! Though it breaks my heart, I will not interfere! For this... is the path you have chosen...!"
"Who cares about that?! Be a responsible owner and control your Peeeet!"
